Basics

JavaScript like all other programming languages have building blocks which when combined together produce an 'exectuable' that you can run within the JavaScript run-time environment. The run time is most likely the browser or the node plaftform on the server but it does NOT have to be. Any run-time that can compile and interpret JavaScript source code can indeed be used to program JavaScript applications.

Statements


        
var javascript = "is cool";

        
var node = "Node is awesome";
